caption.p: Comparison of MBCs of lemon grass oil and its major component citral. a to e: Comparison of minimum bactericidal concentrations of lemon grass oil and its major component citral, with antibiotics viz- ciprofloxacin, gentamicin, ampicillin, streptomycin and chloramphenicol respectively, against various Gram + and Gram- bacteria. The inverses of MBC values are represented in the figures to have a better presentation.
